PostProcessing::PyTransferQuad

PostProcessing::PyTransferQuad Class Reference

This class implements a simple FilterQuad for use by PyPhase objects that uses 1 sample and no offsets. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements a simple FilterQuad for use by PyPhase objects that uses 1 sample and no offsets.
